item.title: Devlog #2 - Blob Bridge Available on Mobile Platforms
item.description:
Overview

After two months of radio silence — and countless hours spent turning a game jam idea into reality — I’m excited to announce that Blob Bridge is now live on the Google Play Store and Apple App Store!

I definitely had more ideas and features I wanted to add — but those will have to wait for future updates. After all, it’s important to make sure the core concept works before diving in too deep!

item.title: Devlog #1 - Gamedev.js Game Jam 2025 Submission Review
item.description:
Overview

Here’s a late update about my game submission for Gamedev.js Game Jam 2025! Before we begin, the game is available on Itch.io, check it out! PS: Please remember to read the description for the controls!

Game Jam Theme - Balance

This year’s theme for the game jame was “Balance”. Generally, my purpose for joining game jam is to test some of gameplay mechanics ideas. This would give me a rough idea of whether it is worth continuing developing on the game. For this year’s theme, some of the ideas I had were…
